code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Perfume from'./perfume';import'./beauty.css';import b1 from'./assests/b1.jpg';import b2 from'./assests/b2.jpg';import b3 from'./assests/b3.jpg';import b5 from'./assests/b5.jpg';import{MdDelete}from"react-icons/md";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductCard(_ref){let{image,title}=_ref;const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(0);const addToCart=()=>setQuantity(prev=>prev+1);const removeFromCart=()=>setQuantity(prev=>prev>0?prev-1:0);const deleteCart=()=>setQuantity(0);const handleBuy=()=>{setQuantity(prev=>{const newQty=prev;alert("".concat(newQty," ").concat(title," ordered successfully"));return newQty;});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:title,className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"quantity",children:["Add to Cart: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:quantity})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addToCart,children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:removeFromCart,disabled:quantity===0,children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:deleteCart,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MdDelete,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"buy-btn",onClick:handleBuy,children:"Buy"})]});}function CartCard(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"beauty",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"h1",children:"Beauty"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{image:b1,title:"Liquid Lipstick"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{image:b2,title:"Nail Polish"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{image:b3,title:"Body Lotion"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{image:b5,title:"Compact Powder"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Perfume,{})]});}export default CartCard;
